Error: Outage sim results are not ready. If you have already submitted an outagesimjob, please try again later. If not, please first submit an outagesimjob by sending a POST request to v1/outagesimjob/ with run_uuid and bau parameters. This will generate outage simulation results that you can access from a GET request to the v1/job/<run uuid>/resilience_stats endpoint. Sample body data for POST-ing to /outagesimjob/: {"run_uuid": "6ea30f0f-3723-4fd1-8a3f-bebf8a3e4dbf", "bau": false}
